resources.string:
User Profile: - Sex: %1$s - Age: %2$d - Height: %3$.1f cm - Weight: %4$.1f kg - Activity Level: %5$s
Health Metrics & Context: - Primary Goal: %6$s - Intensity: %7$s - Secondary Focus: %8$s - Health Conditions: %9$s - Dietary Pattern: %10$s - Medications: %11$s
Available Daily Metrics to Track: Calories, Protein, Fiber.
Task: Based on this profile, generate a "Detailed Daily Target" plan. The output must be in this format:
"Based on your profile and the goal of [GOAL], here is a detailed daily target. This plan focuses on [STRATEGY] while [Is_Caloric_Deficit_Or_Surplus].
Daily Target Summary: - Calories: [VALUE] kcal ([RATIONALE]) - Protein: [VALUE]g ([RATIONALE]) - Fiber: [VALUE]g ([RATIONALE])"
Keep it concise, encouraging, and scientifically grounded.
